QuestData.Title: Tablets of Baa'ri
QuestData.Description: The Ashtongue Broken have been ordered by Illidan to excavate the Ruins of Baa'ri, to the far north. They're in search of draenei artifacts, no doubt - Baa'ri was home to many Baa'ri relics before Gul'dan buried the town under a volcanic explosion. We must use this opportunity to recover the Tablets of Baa'ri, an ancient text rumored to hold the secrets of the Temple of Karabor... a place you might know as the Black Temple.
QuestData.LogDescription: Arcanist Thelis at the Sanctum of the Stars wants you to collect 12 Baa'ri Tablets from the ground and from Ashtongue Workers at the Ruins of Baa'ri.$B$BCompleting quests with the Scryers will cause your Aldor reputation level to decrease.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you found the tablets yet, $n?
QuestData.RewardText: The Baa'ri tablets! Yes, this might provide us with very useful information.
